post.image_prompt: A close-up shot focusing on the upper half of a woman's face, showcasing perfectly sculpted and lifted eyebrows. The model has flawless, dewy skin with a subtle, natural makeup look. The eyebrows are the star of the show: meticulously shaped, filled in with a gradient effect (lighter at the inner corner, darker towards the tail), and brushed upwards to create a feathery, lifted appearance. The brow hairs are clearly defined and separated, not overly filled or blocky. The background is a soft, blurred gradient of warm, neutral tones (beige, cream, light brown) to keep the focus on the brows. The lighting is soft and diffused, creating a flattering glow and highlighting the texture of the brow hairs. The overall mood is sophisticated, polished, and aspirational. The image should have a clean, modern aesthetic, reminiscent of high-end beauty photography. The model's eye is partially visible, with a hint of a soft, neutral eyeshadow and perfectly curled lashes. The composition is slightly asymmetrical, with the focus slightly shifted to one eyebrow to create visual interest. The image should convey a sense of effortless beauty and attainable brow perfection.

queryUsed: create fully theme aligned eyebrow up post for me
